dict.string: Studied Electronics Technology affiliated with Mumbai University , a course where I got the basic knowledge of Electronics and a spark to pursue Engineering, during my studies we built numerous projects, I was chosen to represent my college in intra college sience fair, Stood first in the fair and in studies.

Studies in ever prestigious Xaviers Technical Institute which is one of the oldest technical institute, A three year course in Electronics and Telecommunication was all i wanted to take my knowledge about electronics and Microprocessors to a new level. I even got an opportunity to represent my college in the intra college marathon and won. During my final year I had made a Moon Rover as my final year project.

I was lucky enough to get an admission into Mumbai university's top prestigious college Xaviers institute of Engineering. I did my best coz I had been admitted directly to the second year due to my advanced diploma. I again got to win for my college in marathon and my final year project was a hit amoung the faculty which was even published into an engineering journal. It was "Home Automation Using Raspberry Pi" which had al the bells and whistles like Face recognition algo and much more

Working at Nexm was the golden period of building my carrer in iOS, as I was the sole iOS developer with the company and had the responcibility of maintaining 4 successful and complex apps and had to develop 3 more from stratch, along with a chess engine and the famous Square Off project. It gave me a large picture and an opportunity to learn the nooks and corners of the technology.

Reliance is a large organisation one amoung fortune 500, I learned a lot about Corporate strucure and formal documentation, a formal approach to development, Scrum, Agile environments, and intreaction with third party QA teams. Mentoring young professionals. It was a great experience where it put a lot of tools on my belt to face a challenge in any organisation.
